capsules_submitted.utterance: I think it's interesting that you mentioned McGonagall's age. I've always been a fan of the Harry Potter series and she's one of my favorite characters. She's just so wise and powerful as a witch, and her backstory is really fascinating. Anyway, did you know that in the books, McGonagall is actually over 100 years old when we meet her?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of personality does valeria have as an adult?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has an affiliation with the Hogvy organization. That's really interesting, isn't it? It makes sense that someone like Filch, who's so dedicated to maintaining order and discipline, would be connected to a group that shares those values.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the character Filch from Harry Potter is considered an adult. That's confirmed by most sources, and I can confirm it too - he does seem like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: cool! so, filch is also an adult, just like professor mcgonagall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the life of Minerva McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and a fantastic Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts. I mean, can you believe she was only 36 when she became a full professor? That's incredible. And as for her age, I think it's safe to say that being an adult is just the beginning of her journey.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's magic wand is definitely one of his most notable possessions. I mean, it's hard to imagine him without it, right? It's like an extension of himself, you know? The fact that he's so confident in its abilities is really reassuring.

You know, I think Harry's magic wand is a really special thing. It's like an extension of himself, and it holds so much power.
